content: across the back needle until the foot measures round 9 k0 2 4 *k4 ssk yo k5 yo k2tog k2 repeat from * one 1½ 1¾ 2 inches short of the desired length more time knit to end of round pick up stitches round 11 k0 2 4 *k5 ssk yo k3 yo k2tog k3 repeat from * one using the back needle pick up and knit 16 18 20 sts along the toe decreases more time knit to end of round heel flap edge pick up and knit one additional st to close the gap begin decreasing for toe shaping as follows round 13 k0 2 4 *k6 ssk yo k1 yo k2tog k4 repeat from * one place a marker beginning on round 1 of the romantical pattern more time knit to end of round knit in pattern across the first 16 18 20 sts of the front needle round 1 front needle k1 ssk knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 round 15 k0 2 4 *k7 ssk yo k6 repeat from * one more time this is now needle 1 round 1 back needle work as per front needle 4 sts decrease on knit to end of round round round 17 knit using the front needle work in established pattern across the round 2 knit round 18 knit next 16 18 20 sts place a marker pick up and knit one additional st to close the gap then pick up and knit 16 18 20 sts repeat rnds 1 & 2 until 32 sts rem ending with round 2 16 sts each repeat rnds 1-18 3 times ending with round 18 along the heel flap edge knit 9 10 11 heel stitches this is now on front and back needles needle 2 finishing romantical pattern chart there are now 42 47 52 sts on each needle break yarn leaving a 10-inch tail using the kitchener stitch close the toe of your sock weave in the ends rock your new work section 2 times socks 17 15 chart legend 13 knit k yarn over yo 11 stitch repeat sl2kpsso 9 size small 64 sts k2tog 7 size medium 72 sts ssk 5 size large 80 sts 3 1 25 23 21 19 17 15 13 11 9 7 5 3 1 page 2 of 3 @notsorryknitter on ravelry instagram ello & twitter | unapologeticknitter com | the unapologetic knitter on facebook & youtube cuff heel flap work the gusset cast on 64 72 80 sts loosely using your preferred method with ws facing and knitting flat on the back needle round 1 needle 1 knit to 2 sts before marker ssk sm work divide the sts evenly place the first 32 36 40 sts on the front row 1 ws k3 purl to end of row across 16 18 20 instep sts in established pattern needle - these will be the front/instep sts the last 32 36 40 sts row 2 rs p3 *k1 sl 1 repeat
